## Text Formats

-   **Bold Text**

-   *Italic Text*

-   ***Bold and Italics***

-   ~~Strikethrough~~

-   ^superscript^ / ~subscript~

-   `verbatim code`

-   [Hyperlinks](https://quarto.org)

-   

    > Blockquotes for quoting external sources or highlighting ideas.

-   Math formulas: $E = mc^2$

## Lists

### Unordered List

-   Item 1
-   Item 2
    -   Sub-item 1
    -   Sub-item 2

### Ordered List

1.  First item
2.  Second item
    1.  Sub-item
    2.  Sub-item

### Check Lists

-   [ ] First item
-   [x] Second item
    -   [ ] Sub-item
    -   [ ] Sub-item
